variables.name: contvarAppName
variables.prompt: What is your project name? e.g. myspringjwtexample

checks.error: Project name must be only letters

variables.name: contvarDomainName
variables.prompt: Specify domain name of the project? e.g. com.{your input}

checks.error: Project name must be only letters or numbers

variables.name: contvarX-Access-Token
variables.prompt: Specify access token response header name?

checks.error: Project name must be only letters and hyphen

variables.name: contvarX-Refresh-Token
variables.prompt: Specify refresh token response header name?

checks.error: Project name must be only letters and hyphen
